content: this pattern is beginner friendly and easily adjustable to make it perfect for you the pattern includes sizes for all heads the ribbed texture is simple modern and perfect for the cooler seasons add a pom pom for some extra fun and i promise everyone will be asking you to make them one pattern includes -detailed instructions for sizes newborn-adult large -photos for reference -adjustment suggestions to make standard fit or slouchy fit difficulty easy yarn used bulky weight 5 hook size k / 6 50 mm standard us crochet terms pattern includes 8 sizes 0-3 months 3-6 months 6-12 months 1-3 years 3-10 years adult small adult medium and adult large find the free version of this pattern at www theturtletrunk com
